name: ScienceConsult BV
legal: BV ('besloten vennootschap' according to Dutch law)
membership: Professional societies related to life sciences, food safety, nutrition, bio-based economy.
goal: ScienceConsult offers over twenty years of experience in health-related science and its management in food/beverage and other life sciences. Key areas of expertise are general management and worldwide representation of international associations, stakeholder interactions, food/beverage regulatory affairs, food safety, nutrition, product development, marketing support, business development, second opinions and strategic support. ScienceConsult has access to a large scientific network in the food and beverage industry, government and academia.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Food safety policy.
Nutrition policy.
Food/beverage safety assessment opinions and guidelines.
